General.Name: Botswana Diamonds plc
General.Description: Botswana Diamonds plc explores for and develops diamond properties in Botswana, South Africa, and Zimbabwe. The company's flagship property is the Thorny River/Marsfontein property located in South Africa. It also explores in the Kalahari region of Botswana. Botswana Diamonds plc was formerly known as Botswana Exploration plc and changed its name to Botswana Diamonds plc in October 2010. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
General.Address: 162 Clontarf Road, Dublin, Ireland, D03 F6Y0
